efs.title: EasyFind item search
easyfind.title: EasyFind Configuration
easyfind.showDescription.desc: Displays additional information about items in the search interface
easyfind.darkenBG.desc: Adds a darkened overlay behind the search interface for better visibility
easyfind.coloredRarity.desc: Colors item names based on their rarity (common, uncommon, rare, epic, etc.)
easyfind.showDisabledItem.desc: Displays items that are currently disabled or unavailable in search results
easyfind.saveHistory.desc: Keeps track of previously selected items for quick access and suggestions
easyfind.keepScreenOn: Do not close after picked an item
easyfind.keepScreenOn.desc: Controls when the search screen closes after selecting an item
easyfind.replaceNeighbor: When hotbar is full, what slot to replace
easyfind.replaceNeighbor.desc: Determines which slot to replace when your hotbar is full and you select a new item
easyfind.forcedReplace.desc: Always replaces the currently selected hotbar slot, even if it contains items
easyfind.ignoreExisting.desc: Prevents adding items that already exist in your inventory to avoid duplicates
